name: Match-Ride Rescue
description:
Match-Ride Rescue is a side-scrolling game in which the player, as an insect rescue ranger named Match, pilots a tiny match-powered hot-air balloon to save other bugs from a flood. I created this game with friends for Week 55 of the Weekly Game Jam. Best played in fullscreen.

Press "R" or "Escape" to quit to the main menu at any time during gameplay.

If you are playing in the Chrome browser, ensure "Use hardware acceleration when available" is checked under "Advanced" settings.

If you still experience performance issues in the browser, download the game for a smoother experience.

Producer/Programmer: Luke Piazza (https://pizzadelivery3.itch.io/)

Lead Programmer: Paris Geis (https://geisworks.itch.io/)

Lead Visual Artist: Keziah Yarnoff

Lead Sound Designer: Jake Hyland

Team Page: https://bsharpgames.itch.io/
